title: Margaret Talev on John Kelly (Audio)
itunes:title: Margaret Talev on John Kelly (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Margaret Talev\u0010Senior White House Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss the latest political news from DC, including John Kelly's appointment as White House Chief of Staff.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
